column4: Hello all, I've got my new system setup - with only one problem. My onboard sound is surround 7.1 but I have just a pair of 2 stereo speakers. So most of the spoken dialog is lost.
Can someone please tell me how to configure the sound card so that it'll down mix the channels by default?
Right now I am getting by using mplayer's ao / channel options.
this is a common problem and I have not found a single solution
